fields.name: OrganisationURI
fields.title: Organisation URI
fields.description: This is the URL of the organisation on https://opendatacommunities.org

fields.name: OrganisationLabel
fields.title: Organisation Label
fields.description: The organisation's name

fields.name: SiteReference
fields.title: Site reference
fields.description: A unique reference that an organisation uses to identify the site

fields.name: SiteNameAddress
fields.title: The site name and address
fields.description: The name of the site and it's address

fields.name: GeoX
fields.title: GeoX
fields.description: The longitude of a point close to the centre of the site. The value should be 6 or fewer decimal places, using the WGS84 or ETRS89 coordinate system

fields.name: GeoY
fields.title: GeoY
fields.description: The latitude of a point close to the centre of the site. The value should be 6 or fewer decimal places, using the WGS84 or ETRS89 coordinate system

fields.name: SiteplanURL
fields.title: Site plan url
fields.description: The site plan url if available on a public url

fields.name: Hectares
fields.title: Hectares
fields.description: The land area of the site in hectares, up to 2 decimal places.

fields.name: OwnershipStatus
fields.title: Ownership status
fields.description: The site’s ownership

constraints.pattern: (?i)(owned by a public authority|mixed ownership|not owned by a public authority)

fields.name: PlanningStatus
fields.title: Planning status
fields.description: The stage of the planning process the site is at

fields.name: PermissionType
fields.title: Permission type
fields.description: The type of permission type for developing the site

constraints.pattern: (?i)(full planning permission|outline planning permission|reserved matters approval|permission in principle|technical details consent|planning permission granted under an order|other)

fields.name: PermissionDate
fields.title: Permission date
fields.description: The date the most recent permission was granted on the site

fields.name: PlanningHistory
fields.title: Planning history
fields.description: Links to any web pages that give information on the site’s planning history. Multiple links must be separated by pipe character

fields.name: Deliverable
fields.title: Deliverable
fields.description: This indicates if there is a reasonable prospect that residential development will take place on the land within 5 years of the date you enter this site inthe register

fields.name: NetDwellingsRangeFrom
fields.title: Net dwellings range from
fields.description: The minimum number of dwellings that the local authority estimates the site should support, as defined in http://www.legislation.gov.uk/uksi/2017/403/regulation/2/made

fields.name: NetDwellingsRangeTo
fields.title: Net dwellings range to
fields.description: The maximum number of dwellings that the local authority estimates the site should support, as defined in regulation 2 of the 2017 Regulations (http://www.legislation.gov.uk/uksi/2017/403/regulation/2/made)

fields.name: HazardousSubstances
fields.title: Hazardous substances
fields.description: This indicates if the local authority is required by regulation 26(3) of the Planning (Hazardous Substances) Regulations 2015 (https://www.legislation.gov.uk/uksi/2015/627/regulation/26/made) to conduct an environmental impact assessment on the proposed development

fields.name: Notes
fields.title: Notes
fields.description: General information about a site that developers might find useful

fields.name: FirstAddedDate
fields.title: First added date
fields.description: The date that the site was first added to this register, in the format YYYY-MM-DD

fields.name: LastUpdatedDate
fields.title: Last updated date
fields.description: The date this entry in the register was updated in the format YYYY-MM-DD

fields.name: EndDate
fields.title: End date
fields.description: The date the site was developed or determined to no longer be a brownfield site, in the format YYYY-MM-DD. If the site no longer needs to be listed it should remain on the register and not be deleted
